Author: ComputerGenie 游놊游낖游닉#7004
Content: afaik, you cannot send out system alerts without a full fork of the code and changing the alert key

Author: akshaynexus#3840

Author: ComputerGenie 游놊游낖游닉#7004
Content:
yes, all relevant cli commands work
you simply need to add the param of `komodo-cli -ac_name=MYCHANNAME somecommand`
